site.name: Modus Zero
site.title: Modus Zero
site.description: Agentic engineering platform for autonomous code orchestration and real-time reasoning visualization.

product_list.mod0_description: Autonomous environment for real-time vibe coding

resource_list.first_steps_description: Initialize your first swarm in minutes

footer.tagline: Architecting the future of autonomous engineering.

hero.headline: The First Autonomous Reasoning Environment
hero.subheadline: Where high-level intent meets deterministic execution.
hero.description: Deploy specialized agent swarms that reason, execute, and self-heal through interactive Thinking Graphs and native Kanban orchestration.

why_use_it.title: Why Modus Zero?
why_use_it.subtitle: Beyond automation. True agentic autonomy for modern engineering teams.

go_see_it.title: Initialize Your Swarm
go_see_it.description: Join thousands of engineers orchestrating complex logic through Mod0 technology.

mod0.name: Mod0
mod0.description: Mod0 orchestrates specialized agents to handle the complexity of modern development. From Thinking Graphs to Kanban execution, it provides the deterministic infrastructure for next-generation software engineering.

how_it_works.title: Operational Workflow
how_it_works.subtitle: From command-line initialization to visual autonomous orchestration.

step_1.title: Initialize & Define
step_1.description: Start with `mod0 init`. Define your objective and set the agentic boundaries for the environment.

step_2.title: Contextual Ingestion
step_2.description: Connect your stack. The system indexes your codebase to build a multi-dimensional mental model.

step_3.title: Graph Reasoning
step_3.description: Visualize the Thinking Graph. Review the agent's logic branches and task breakdown before execution.

step_4.title: Kanban Orchestration
step_4.description: Tasks are dispatched to the Agentic Kanban where specialized worker agents take ownership of each card.

step_5.title: Autonomous Execution
step_5.description: Agents operate in hardened sandboxes, writing and refactoring code with built-in self-healing protocols.

step_6.title: Trace & Validate
step_6.description: Review the complete execution trace and reasoning logs. Approve the final output and deploy.
